column3: Nice cleanup!\n\nACK b3d764ac392a6de68ea77eb4c0a5dbbad01e94ef -- diff looks correct

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#17398](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/17398.html) (build: Update leveldb to 1.22+ by laanwj)
I'd slightly prefer this as two commits: one that changes the comments, one that changes the use of backticks (the latter is a real code change)

Concept ACK.

`#`-styled comments are not discarded by `m4`. Therefore, these changes effectively remove `dnl`-styled comments from the generated `configure` script. Is it intended?

Refs:
- https://www.gnu.org/savannah-checkouts/gnu/m4/manual/m4-1.4.18/m4.html#Comments
- https://www.gnu.org/savannah-checkouts/gnu/m4/manual/m4-1.4.18/m4.html#Dnl

> #-styled comments are not discarded by m4. Therefore, these changes effectively remove dnl-styled comments from the generated configure script. Is it intended?\n\nSure, generating a smaller configure file seems better.
> I'd slightly prefer this as two commits:\n\n@laanwj I've split this into two.
